title: 【搬运德国作品】100*100大庄园
author: 筒子
txt_content:
?tage Palais | Lux in Spelunca
一个100*100的大型庄园
绿化相比我上一个地图做的更加的好
里面的内饰也非常的足
从下面的平面图可以看出来这个建筑的造型规划都非常的漂亮
老规矩，把作者原话发一下吧
This Custom Italianate Mansion Boasts 8 Bedrooms, 8 Full Bathrooms, Two Full Kitchens, A Grand Double Staircase foyer, 6 Fireplaces, 5 Car Garage, Billiard Room, Game room with Ping-Pong table, Gym, Custom Theater Room with Stadium Seating, Massive Backyard Space with Tiered Landscaping and flowing ponds. A Limestone Gazebo With Glass Dome, Custom Furnishings, 3 Floors, And Much Much More! Vieing the house you can tell that every floor is different, and every ceiling with exciting new details and materials. Every bedroom is a full suite with their own Private bathroom. Unmatched and Exquisite Details down to the Furniture in every room compliment the House's Grand Exterior. This Home Being the Perfect for any Wealthy Family ready to Show-off to any Competing neighbor. 下面是展示图片时间

replies.author: Yy星人
replies.txt_content: 搬运的也是蛮拼了,好评！

replies.author: sallycilia
replies.txt_content: 真美！不过，楼主，你知道作者用的什么材质包吗？

replies.txt_content:
